video.title: Vexed
video.synopsis: Charming slacker DI Jack Armstrong and driven professional DI Kate Bishop try to solve crimes together without driving each other crazy.

episodes.synopsis: Cops Jack and Kate, who differ on everything, find their hunt for a killer improves their love lives, careers and their relationship with each other.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Jack and Kate enter the world of therapy when a depressed banker is targeted by a hired gun while being treated at a private rehabilitation clinic.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: The kidnapping of a pop star shines an awkward spotlight on Jack and Kate; Kate's husband attempts to start anew; Jack obsesses over a medical issue.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: DI Jack Armstrong is paired with a new partner, straitlaced Georgina Dixon, when a car salesman is found murdered on the showroom floor.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: After spending the day navigating gender politics while investigating a murder on a university campus, Georgina and Jack pursue romantic interests.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Working in missing persons, the partners investigate a local gym, where Jack is bitten by the self-improvement bug and Georgina develops a crush.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Georgina gets too wrapped up in her role as an undercover contestant on a TV chef competition show. Meanwhile, Jack tries to win a woman with food.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Jack and Georgina make short work of the case of a murdered headmaster, but begin to doubt themselves when reviewing the facts.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: The partners investigate a jewelry store robbery, Jack's brother suddenly asks him to be best man at his wedding, and Georgina tries online dating.
episodes.title: Episode 6
